borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning application ref: 2024/01505/NMAT granted 22nd July 2024 for the 'Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: 2021/03989/FUL granted 14th April 2023 to allow the description of proposal to change from 'Replacement of the existing metal railings on the rear-side elevations with 1.7m high obscure-glazed screening; upgrading the existing metal railings on the rear elevation to increase the height to 1.1m from the new floor level at second floor level; and the installation of new timber decking to the existing second floor roof terrace' to 'Replacement of the existing metal railings on the rear-side elevations with 1.7m high obscure-glazed screening; upgrading the existing metal railings on the rear elevation to increase the height to 1.1m from the new floor level at second floor level; and the installation of new decking to the existing second floor roof terrace' to allow the change in material of the decking from timber to millboard composite.
